planet.name: CoRoT-22 b
2MASS 18424010+0613088 b
planet.description: CoRoT-22 b is a transiting exoplanet discovered by the European CoRoT space mission. The planetary nature of this object has been validated by a full Bayesian analysis including observing constraints from radial-velocity spectroscopy, adaptive optics imaging and the CoRoT transit shape, as well as from priors on stellar populations, planet and multiple stellar systems frequency.
